short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A notepad for writing and saving notes quickly in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-------------------------------------------------------------

Features:
-Copy/Paste notes between tabs and instances of Chrome.
-Access your notes anywhere. Saved notes are synced to your Google account.
-This stenopad remembers how you left it, so you never have to worry about losing your notes.
